high roller.translation[0].definitions[0: someone who spends a lot of money carelessly or risks a lot of money on games, races etc
high roller.translation[1].definitions[0: someone who spends a lot of money or who risks a lot of money, especially in GAMBLING (=risking money on the results of card games, races etc)
For really high rollers there is Marquis Louis Roederer Crystal champagne at $205 a bottle.
